---
id: GetBatchOrders
title: 批量查询订单
sidebar_label: 批量查询订单
sidebar_position: 4
---

**类型:** GET

**接口:** `/spot/v4/batch-order`

### 参数

| 参数名 | 类型 | 是否必填 | 默认值 | 描述 | 取值范围 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| orderIds | string | 是 |  | 订单ID，例如：`6216559590087220004, 6216559590087220005` |  |

### 注意事项

响应字段信息与**查询单个订单**相同。

### 响应示例

```json title="响应"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": [
    {
      "symbol": "BTC_USDT",
      "orderId": "6216559590087220004",
      "clientOrderId": "16559590087220001",
      "baseCurrency": "string",
      "quoteCurrency": "string",
      "side": "BUY",
      "type": "LIMIT",
      "timeInForce": "GTC",
      "price": "40000",
      "origQty": "2",
      "origQuoteQty": "48000",
      "executedQty": "1.2",
      "leavingQty": "string",
      "tradeBase": "2",
      "tradeQuote": "48000",
      "avgPrice": "42350",
      "fee": "string",
      "feeCurrency": "string",
      "state": "NEW",
      "time": 1655958915583,
      "updatedTime": 1655958915583
    }
  ]
}
```
